name: Attack
note:
スキル１番は［攻撃］コマンドを
選択したときに使用されます。

name: Guard
note:
スキル２番は［防御］コマンドを
選択したときに使用されます。

message1: is choosing to wait and see!
name: Wait

description:
Sharpen your mind and strengthen your next attack.
Recovers a lot of TP, but consumes a lot of MP.
name: High Charge

description:
Sharpen your mind and strengthen your next turn's 
attack. Also restores a small amount of TP.
name: Charge

description:
A powerful slash attack. A little stronger than normal 
attacks.
name: Slash

description: An improved version of Slash, and more powerful.
name: Slash β

description:
A further improved version of Slash. Its power is also 
greatly increased.
name: Slash γ

description:
Delivers a crushing blow to the enemy. 
Has a slow start-up time.
name: Heavy Attack

description:
Swings the weapon with the full weight of one's body.
Activates at the end of the turn.
name: Last Break

description:
Unleashes a ferocious thrust attack, dealing damage 
that ignores the enemy's defence.
name: Breakthrough

description:
A powerful attack contained in a single slash. 
Enemies will be in pain for several turns.
name: Meteor Breaker

description:
Slashes twice at random enemies.
Each slash is weaker than normal attacks.
name: Flowing Lotus

description:
Slashes thrice at random enemies.
Each slash is weaker than normal attacks.
name: Flying Lotus

description:
Slashes four times at random enemies with 
lightning-fast speed.
name: Lightning Fang

description:
Unleashes thrust attacks at unbelievable speeds.
Attacks at the beginning of the turn.
name: Gale

description:
Unleashes a chain of high-speed thrusts.
Attacks at the beginning of the turn.
name: Flowing Gale Lotus

description:
Slashes an enemy with a dance-like movement.
Increases number of actions for several turns.
name: Sword Dance

description:
Unleashes a series of super-fast thrusts at an enemy.
Increases own AGI.
name: Vortex Sword

description:
Sweep at an enemy's legs causing them to fall,
stunning them.
name: Clean Sweep

description:
Releases an oblong shockwave that streaks across the 
ground, stunning an enemy.
name: Ground Wave

description:
Stuns all enemies with a shockwave that shakes the very 
earth itself.
name: Ground Burst

description: Attacks by slashing all enemies at once.
name: Mono Flash

description: Attacks all enemies with a lightning-sharp strike.
name: Lightning Flash

description:
Deals two air-splitting slashes ignore defence on all 
enemies.
name: Lightning Flash

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of fire.
name: Flame Sword

description:
Attacks a single enemy with a burst of flame from a 
sword.
name: Blaze Slash

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of lightning.
name: Thunder Sword

description:
Shoots lightning from one's sword 3 times at random 
enemies.
name: Imperial Thunder

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of water.
name: Aqua Sword

description: Attacks a single enemy with a tidal wave of water.
name: Water Lily

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of ice.
name: Ice Sword

description: Attacks random enemies twice with an ice blade.
name: Cold Shard

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of earth.
name: Earth Sword

description: A sword of earth that pierces a single enemy.
name: Shinra Sword

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of wind.
name: Storm Sword

description: Creates a blade of wind that cuts through all enemies.
name: Vacuum Wave

description: A slashing attack imbued with the power of light.
name: Shine Blade

description: Burns a single enemy.
name: Burn

description: Fires 3 spells in a row that burns enemies.
name: Chain Burn

description: Paralyses a single enemy.
name: Paralyse

description: Casts paralysis spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Paralyse

description: Puts a single enemy to sleep.
name: Sleep

description: Casts sleeping spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Sleep

description: Silences a single enemy.
name: Silent

description: Casts silence spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Silent

description: Makes a single enemy blind.
name: Blind

description: Casts blinding spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Blind

description: Confuses a single enemy.
name: Panic

description: Casts panic spell 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Panic

description: An attack that lowers the Crit Rate of a single enemy.
name: Luck Break

description: An attack that lowers the ATK of a single enemy.
name: Power Break

description: Performs 3 attacks that lower ATK.
name: Chain Power Break

description: An attack that lowers the DEF of a single enemy.
name: Guard Break

description: Performs 3 attacks that lower DEF.
name: Chain Guard Break

description: An attack that lowers the AGI of a single enemy.
name: Speed Break

description: Performs 3 attacks that lower AGI.
name: Chain Speed Break

description: An attack that lowers MAT and MDF of a single enemy.
name: Magic Break

description: Performs 3 attacks that lower MAT and MDF.
name: Chain Magic Break

description: Restores a small amount of one's own HP, MP, and TP.
name: First Aid

description: Absorbs the HP of a single enemy.
name: Drain Sword

description: Absorbs enemy's HP 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Drain

description: Absorbs a single enemy's MP.
name: Magic Steal

description: Absorbs enemy's MP 3 times in a row.
name: Chain Magic Steal

description: Raises the Crit Rate of a single ally.
name: Enhance Luck

description: Raises the ATK of a single ally.
name: Enhance Power

description: Raises the DEF of a single ally.
name: Enhance Guard

description: Raises the AGI of a single ally.
name: Enhance Speed

description: Raises MAT and MDF of a single ally.
name: Enhance Magic

description:
Deploys a barrier that halves magic damage to all 
allies.
name: Magical Barrier

description:
A magic spell that instantly transports to pocket 
space.
name: Warp

description: Magic that restores about 400 HP.
name: Heal α

description: Magic that restores about 700 HP.
name: Heal β

description: Magic that restores about 1300 HP.
name: Heal γ

description: Magic that restores about 3000 HP.
name: Heal δ

description:
A magical attack made of light.
Though it's power is small...
name: Ray

description: With the power of motivation, recover some MP and TP.
name: Yell

description: Removes Poison from an ally and restores a bit of HP.
name: Poison Care

description:
Halves lightning damage taken by all allies for 3 
turns. Also prevents Paralysis.
name: Anti Thunder

description:
Completely revives an ally who is unable to fight.
Dream World use only.
name: Revival Spell

description: Magic that recovers 500 HP for all allies.
name: All Heal

description: Magic that recovers HP of all allies by about 1200.
name: Action Heal

description: Recovers a small amount of HP each turn.
name: Regen

description:
Cures Poison, Burn, Blind, Frozen, and Confused for an 
ally.
name: Cure

description:
Recovers 700 HP for an ally and cures ailments. (Poison
/Blind/Silence/Confused/Sleep/Burn/Paralysis/Frozen)
name: Exceed Cure

description: Magic that restores HP by about 500 and raises DEF.
name: Protect Heal

description:
Shuts down the bodily functions of all enemies.
Ineffective against some enemies.
name: Death To All

description:
Cuts off an enemy's breath.
Ineffective on some enemies.
name: Death

description:
Revives a single ally with 50% HP and halves the damage 
they take in that turn.
name: Revive

description:
Revives all allies and fully restores HP and MP.
Also, MP consumption becomes 0 for several turns.
name: Sylphy Zone

description:
Fully revive a single ally and greatly reduce damage 
they take that turn.
name: Angel Revive
